Description: Ottawa is designated as a Restrict/Orange Zone(Designated Nov 7th)
Ottawa stay-at home order ends, back to being Orange zone
Toronto is designated as a Restrict/Orange Zone(Designated Nov 7th)
Toronto is declared a red zone(only outdoor dining allowed)
Toronto goes into lockdown, designated as grey zone
Toronto continues to be in lockdown
Toronto in lockdown but some gyms and restaurants begin opening
